title: 75.5 Perches bare land just 100m from Kandy Road
details: 75.5 Perches bare land just 100m from Kandy Road 20Km post in Kirillawala, Kadawatha. Property encircled by a parapet wall. Survey Plan has been approved by UDA. Access road maintained by Mahara Pradeshiya Sabha. Clear title. No brokers please.
